extension.summary: Install PVR Add-ons compiled by margro
extension.description: Download and install PVR add-ons from margro's XBMC PVR addon repository.[CR] If you find a broken or not working addon please report it to 'margro' on the XBMC forum.
extension.disclaimer: XBMC's PVR features and the PVR addons are still under development. The authors are in no way responsible for failed recordings, incorrect timers, wasted hours, or any other undesirable effects...
